title: Test RTB
name: Test RTB
instructions:
You will receive a prompt with a subject, I would like you to write a limerick about that subject. 

Once you have a limerick you should use wingman-rtb tools in this order:

1. extract_content - Extract structured data from the conversation in format {sessionName: "session name", subject: "topic", limerick: "the limerick"}

2. send_webhook - Send the extracted content to webhook https://webhook.site/f2bccfbb-0525-4eb8-8b8e-c17fe4ff1851

3. save_to_file - Save the limerick to temp/output/limerick_<DATE_AND_TIME>.md

4. stop_session - End the session

This multi-step approach ensures reliable content extraction and delivery.
